text: The 1992 European Open was a professional ranking snooker tournament that took place in March 1992 at the Tongeren Snooker Centre in Tongeren, Belgium. Jimmy White won the tournament, defeating Mark Johnston-Allen 9–3 in the final. __TOC__ ==Main draw== ==References== Category:European Masters (snooker) European Open European Open (snooker) European Open (snooker) Category:Snooker in Belgium
title: 1992 European Open (snooker)
